name: Hamburger Salad

instructions.en: Chop the onion and mince the garlic.
instructions.ja: 玉ねぎをみじん切りにし、ニンニクをすりおろします。

instructions.en: In a large skillet, brown the ground beef with the chopped onion, minced garlic, salt, and pepper.
instructions.sk: Na veľkej panvici opečte mleté mäso s nasekanou cibuľou, prelisovaným cesnakom, soľou a korením.
instructions.ja: 大きなフライパンで、挽肉、みじん切りの玉ねぎ、すりおろしたニンニク、塩、コショウを炒めて褐色になるまで調理します。

instructions.en: Drain the grease from the cooked beef mixture.
instructions.sk: Zlejte mastnotu z uvarenej mäsovej zmesi.
instructions.ja: 調理した肉の混ぜ物から脂を切ります。

instructions.en: Allow the beef mixture to cool or chill until no longer warm.
instructions.sk: Nechajte mäsovú zmes vychladnúť alebo ochlaďte, kým už nebude teplá.
instructions.ja: 肉の混ぜ物を冷まし、温かくなくなるまで冷やします。

instructions.en: While the beef is cooling, halve the grape tomatoes.
instructions.sk: Kým mäso chladne, prekrojte hrozno paradajky na polovice.
instructions.ja: 肉が冷めている間に、ブドウトマトを半分に切ります。

instructions.en: In a mixing bowl, combine the cooled beef mixture with mayonnaise, dill pickle relish, and yellow mustard.
instructions.sk: V miske zmiešajte vychladenú mäsovú zmes s majonézou, naloženou uhorkou a žltou horčicou.
instructions.ja: ボウルに冷めた肉の混ぜ物、マヨネーズ、ディルピクルスのレリッシュ、イエローマスタードを入れて混ぜ合わせます。

instructions.en: Add the halved grape tomatoes to the mixture.
instructions.sk: Pridajte do zmesi polovice hrozna paradajok.
instructions.ja: 半分に切ったブドウトマトを混ぜ物に加えます。

instructions.en: Mix all ingredients well and adjust seasonings to taste.
instructions.sk: Všetky prísady dobre premiešajte a podľa chuti upravte korenie.
instructions.ja: 全ての材料をよく混ぜ、味を調整します。

instructions.en: Serve immediately or chill to serve later.
instructions.sk: Podávajte ihneď alebo vychlaďte a podávajte neskôr.
instructions.ja: すぐに提供するか、冷やして後で提供します。

notes: This Hamburger Salad is a creative, keto-friendly twist on the classic hamburger. It's high in protein from the ground beef and provides healthy fats from the mayonnaise. The vegetables add flavor and nutrients while keeping the carb count relatively low. For the best keto results, be mindful of the dill pickle relish and onion, as they can contain some carbs. You may want to use a sugar-free pickle relish or chop your own dill pickles to reduce carbs further. The grape tomatoes also contain some carbs, so adjust the amount based on your daily carb limit. This salad can be served warm or cold, making it versatile for different seasons or preferences. It's great for meal prep and can be stored in the refrigerator for 3-4 days. For added keto-friendly nutrients, you could top the salad with some shredded cheese or diced avocado before serving.
